reviewText: Para ser una edicin tan corta de la telenovela al principio estaba muy lenta. Despus fue mejorando, se intent mostrar casi todo pero como no es tan largo el resumen la historia se muestra muy rpidamente dejando huecos en la trama. An as me entretuvo.

Saw this back east and when came back to ca look forward to see it from beginning and there is even some extras. Only problem that there is no subtitles which would be nice since I'm married to an english person,but other than that was great for me..plan to mail it to my mom back east,no scrathes on DVD!
The soap was short but it kept me focus and the way it was edited did not loose my train of thought.  I am happy with it.  Only complaint to short.

This was one of the first Telenovelas I watched on TV. I absolutely loved this story and the actors. And, yes they did an unjustice by abridging it to much, but this was release fairly early when compared to some of the other novelas. Most of the new telenovela DVDs are running about 700-800 minutes (or 10% of the actual TV run time). I purchased this more as a souvenir and I have watched it a couple of times. The theme song is by Alejandro Fernandez, and it is wonderful as I have that on a video DVD as well. I also, love Karyme Luca Lozano and I have everything that she made. She was in her early 20s in this telenovela. I also love Sergio Goyri---what you can say! He's the typical Latin men role. Very macho! Love him!
This version on DVD is too abridged, too much was cut out.  It seemed more like highlights than a well developed story.

Nina amada mia was really supposed to be called the amazon women however when Alejandro Fernandez pitched his song nina amada mia as the theme song for the soap the producers decided to change the soap to nina amada mia, which in english means my loving girl. This was a great soap with a great story, Karyme Lozano and Sergio Goyri (the villian in Piel de otono) give an outstanding performance as star crossed lovers. Packed with an all star cast this novela was incredible, it asks the question Can Love survive mistrust, social classes, and age? Although the ending was rushed it was not your typical ending for a novlea which I was most grateful. If you like a story filled with romance, intrigue, and the bond and love sisters then pick up a copy of this wonderul soap.

OH YES I LOVE THE NOVELA IS JUST GREAT THAT AMAZON HAS NOVELAS

AND THAT I HAVE THE CHANCE TO ENJOY IT. I LIVE IN GERMANY BECAUSE MY HUSBND IS STATION HERE AND WE ONLY HAVE 14 CHANNELS AND I HAVE NEVER HAD A CHANCE TO ENJOY NOVELAS, BECAUSE I CANNOT SEE IT HERE WHERE IM LOCATED. IM VERY HAPPY AND I WILL CONTINUE TO BUY YOUR NOVELAS AS LONG AMAZON SELLS THEM.

Es una de las telenovelas que mas me ha gustado, la recomiendo 100% eso si es un poco corta pero muy buena, y hay unos grandes actores. YO he disfrutado mucho viendola. Totalmente recomendada. Si quieres una buena novela no lo dudes!!
Wonderful story.  The ending was rushed; it could have been developed more.  Sergio Goyri and Karyme Lozano were excellent, but the DVD was too short.
They cut the video it's not the complete novel, bad.
The video does not have all the scenes of the novel. The video cuts many important scenes. Thank you
No subtitles in Spanish or any language, even though Amazon says there are. Still a good telenovela, but be aware.
Love so much since the 1st time I watched it back in 2008
